name: Golf Madness
description:
Jump into the Golf Gulf!

Play golf on the many islands of the golf atoll amidst the curious Golflins. Take their head off with your club, they love it!
Explore green fields, deserts, ice caps and volcanoes and overcome the different challenges each course has for you and reach the goal-hole to get to the next one.

You can either race against time for a high score in Timed mode or relax and play at your own pace in Zen mode.
